we've just launched the New Thinking Allowed
Dialogues book imprint and our first title is
Is There Life After Death? We've just released
issue number two of the New Thinking Allowed
quarterly magazine. You can download a free copy
at the New Thinking Allowed Foundation website,
newthinkingallowed.org.
